meta.title: Pablo Cruz, Full-stack Developer | Real Estate | Finance | Investing
meta.description: A full-stack developer with a background in real estate, finance, and investing. Explore my projects and skills. Contact me for collaboration opportunities.

header.title: Full-stack software developer.
header.summary: Building scalable web applications, with a strong foundation in real estate, finance, and investing.

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I'm an experienced full-stack developer, passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. With over 9 years of experience as an investment manager at a Single Family Office in Mexico City, I bring a blend of financial acumen and technical expertise to the table.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I've successfully developed web applications with complex front and back-end functionalities, financial modeling tools for informed decision-making and IoT automations for process optimization and monitoring.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I'm excited about opportunities where I can leverage both my programming and business skills to create impactful solutions.
aboutMe.videoText: Check out a 5-minute video where I introduce myself and showcase one of my projects:

skills.expertise1Description: Interactive web & mobile apps with complex front and back end functionalities.
skills.expertise2Description: Represent diverse financial scenarios for analysis and decision-making.
skills.expertise3Description: Automations to monitor equipment, optimize processes & increase quality control.
